column4: well read the poste its not about linuxmint. just cause its hpsted on that site from a lontime user shesh.
are you answering or asking a support question?
giving you info on how to get a ubuntu with 5sec boot for 100mb ram if you dont want to knpoe suit your self

I appreciate the info but that's not really helpful in this channel unless someone specifically asks about it.  A better approach would be to create a nice wiki page with the directions made specific to Ubuntu and then create a thread on the ubuntu forums about it so anyone interested can try it out
